text: Eastman & Evergreen is the second studio album by the Chicago post-hardcore band Baxter. It was recorded between 1996 and 1998 and released in 1999 on Scientific Records on cassette. 100 copies were sold at Baxter's final show, and featured previously released material, and some unreleased songs. ==Track listing== ==References== ==External links== * Baxter fans club Category:Baxter (punk band) albums Category:1999 albums
title: Eastman & Evergreen
